title: Bangladesh Personal Savings
description: Personal Savings in Bangladesh increased to 6512.5 BDT Billion in 2020 from 6362.20 BDT Billion in 2019. Personal Savings in Bangladesh averaged 2173.23 BDT Billion from 1994 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 8946 BDT Billion in 2021 and a record low of 177.40 BDT Billion in 1994. This page provides - Bangladesh Personal Savings - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Ministry of Finance, Bangladesh
